text.content:
Skull Crush

Crit Effect: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 3} until healed.

Bludgeoning

hand Wound

Crit Effect: Until healed, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} and can't use one of its hands (determined randomly by the GM).

Piercing

Broad Swipe

The target takes @Damage[1d4[bleed]].

Slashing

Lingering Damage

The target takes @Damage[1d6[persistent]] damage of the same type as the bomb or spell's damage.

Bomb or Spell
